name: undici
description: An HTTP/1.1 client, written from scratch for Node.js

scripts.test: npm run test:javascript && cross-env NODE_V8_COVERAGE=  npm run test:typescript
scripts.test:javascript: node scripts/generate-pem && npm run test:unit && npm run test:node-fetch && npm run test:fetch && npm run test:cookies && npm run test:eventsource && npm run test:wpt && npm run test:websocket && npm run test:node-test && npm run test:jest
scripts.test:javascript:withoutintl: node scripts/generate-pem && npm run test:unit && npm run test:node-fetch && npm run test:fetch:nobuild && npm run test:cookies && npm run test:eventsource:nobuild && npm run test:wpt:withoutintl && npm run test:node-test
scripts.test:eventsource: npm run build:node && npm run test:eventsource:nobuild
scripts.test:fetch: npm run build:node && npm run test:fetch:nobuild
scripts.test:wpt: node test/wpt/start-fetch.mjs && node test/wpt/start-FileAPI.mjs && node test/wpt/start-mimesniff.mjs && node test/wpt/start-xhr.mjs && node test/wpt/start-websockets.mjs && node test/wpt/start-cacheStorage.mjs && node test/wpt/start-eventsource.mjs
scripts.test:wpt:withoutintl: node test/wpt/start-fetch.mjs && node test/wpt/start-mimesniff.mjs && node test/wpt/start-xhr.mjs && node test/wpt/start-cacheStorage.mjs && node test/wpt/start-eventsource.mjs
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:clean && cross-env NODE_V8_COVERAGE=./coverage/tmp npm run test:javascript && npm run coverage:report
scripts.coverage:ci: npm run coverage:clean && cross-env NODE_V8_COVERAGE=./coverage/tmp npm run test:javascript && npm run coverage:report:ci
scripts.bench: echo "Error: Benchmarks have been moved to '/benchmarks'" && exit 1
scripts.serve:website: echo "Error: Documentation has been moved to '/docs'" && exit 1
